thread.title: TVS launches WEGO BS4 in India, price starts at Rs 50,434 - The Financial Express
thread.title_full: TVS launches WEGO BS4 in India, price starts at Rs 50,434 - The Financial Express

author: Fe Online
title: TVS launches WEGO BS4 in India, price starts at Rs 50,434 - The Financial Express
text:
TVS launches WEGO BS4 in India, price starts at Rs 50,434 TVS launches WEGO BS4 in India, price starts at Rs 50,434 The refreshed WEGO is now available in 10 colours and gets a host of features update By: FE Online | Published: February 20, 2017 6:11 PM TVS WEGO in Trey colour 
TVS Motors has introduced its first product with BS4 emission norms, the 110cc WEGO scooter. The new WEGO is priced at Rs 50,434 (Ex-Showroom Delhi) and will be available in selected TVS dealerships. The 2017 TVS WEGO gets new features such as dual tone seat cover, silver oak panels and a USB charging port under the seat. 
The new TVS WEGO will carry the same 110cc 4-stroke, CVTi, single cylinder, air cooled, OHC engine which complies with BS4 emission norms. The unit produces 8hp of power and 8Nm of torque and is mated to a V-matic CVT transmission. The scooter measure 1,834mm in length, 640mm in width,1,115 mm in height and has a wheelbase of 1,275 mm. The WEGO has a ground clearance of 150mm and a fuel tank capacity of 5 litres. Suspension duties are carried by an in-line telescopic suspension at front and Unit swing with spring loaded hydraulic damper at rear and a sync braking system. TVS WEGO in metallic orange colour 
The 2017 WEGO gets features such as full digital instrument speedometer with all smart alert system that shows service reminder, low fuel indicator, low battery indicator, trip meter. In addition, it gets a 12 inch black alloy wheel and a steel exhaust guard. 
TVS WEGO is available in two variants drum brakes & disc brakes and is now available in 10 colours including two new colours - Dual Tone Blue,Dual Tone Red,Dual Tone White,Deep Sky Blue,Volcano Red,Sporty White,Mercury Grey, Midnight Black, Metallic Orange and T-Grey Tags:
